name: KV Memory Simple
description: Simplified agent to test KV memory operations
system_instructions: You are a simple agent that can store and retrieve key-value pairs.
task_prompt: Store or retrieve a value. Example: 'save name as John' or 'get name'

input_schema.name: value
input_schema.label: Value
input_schema.help: The value to store (only for 'save' command)

tools.name: kv_memory
tools.description: Key-Value memory tool for storing and retrieving data. Use 'set' action with 'value' to store data, 'get' to retrieve, 'delete' to remove, and 'list' to list all keys.
